Site: Saginaw River at Saginaw, MI
Description: Primary GLRI site
Notes: Saginaw is our best option for representing Lake Huron. Often has reverse flow, is this an issue for the samplers? Particulates versus dissolved? Is there another location upstream that is not as heavily impacted by the Bay? Wadeable areas, yes. Deployed historically near YMCA, walking trail. Rip rap near bank, and clay further out. At former gage, not new gage location.
